ComicInfo.Summary:
A continuation of the Backlash series from 1994. This series follows the core cast from Backlash, Backlash, Crimson, and Taboo, along with new recruit for a goverment superhero program titled Wildcore.
Test are still being run on a recovering Alea and Backlash finds out his daughter has been having an intimate relationship with his teammate Stryian. On top of all that the final assault on the D'rahn is about to happen, but Zealot promises she has a trump card and just when things are looking bad she reveals it is Majestic who single-handedly defeats the D'rahn leader and saves the day.
Also, we find the wizard Azrum going to ask Tapestry for help and in the end we find him in a questionable scenario.
